job.title: Quality Assurance Analyst
job.description: ltpgtneed to participate in the following activitiesltpgtltpgt requirement gathering and analysis analyse functionalnonfunctional requirements and seek clarifications for better understanding of requirements define timeline estimates based on the requirementsltpgtltpgt design preparation of technical specification document and review the sameltpgtltpgt coding follow coding standards and best practices to check code quality conduct technical troubleshootingltpgtltpgt testing perform unit testing and coordinate with qa team during the testing phaseltpgtltpgt knowledge management create specific artifacts for tasks allocated by supervisor apply best practices learning during development activitiesltpgtltpgtltstronggtspanishampnbspfluency is the requirement with the ability to follow phone flows alongside an englishspeaking qa testerltstronggtltpgt
